segments.text: So am I on the right road to Piccadilly Circus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so , ‘ cause I remember the policeman told me this is the very way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just head straight up the street about two blocks and then turn left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s it . I think we ’ re one block beyond .
segments.speaker: S1
